attributes.action: Ban the use of AI in schools
attributes.additional_details: Schools have been using AI to: make revision sheets that are often inaccurate; generate random posters for revision (my school even used AI to generate a poster for the eco committee); setting homework; and sometimes to plan the whole lesson. This is clearly wrong in many ways as it is harming our education aswell as the planet.
attributes.background: The government needs to stop schools from cutting corners by AI generating lessons and setting homework on AI sites.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund information campaign for secondary school teachers about generative AI
